en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit Seoul

en: The Secretary for Justice, Ms Teresa Cheng, SC, tomorrow (September 25) will leave for Seoul, Korea, to promote the legal and dispute resolution services of Hong Kong and explore co-operation between the two places.

During her stay in Seoul, Ms Cheng will visit the Ministry of Justice of Korea and meet legal experts and practitioners in Korea. She will also speak at a breakfast session hosted by the Law Society of Hong Kong and the Hong Kong Bar Association during the Annual Conference of the International Bar Association, and call on the Embassy of the People's Republic of China in Korea.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong on September 26.
zh: 律政司司長鄭若驊資深大律師明日（九月二十五日）前赴韓國首爾，推廣香港的法律和解決爭議服務，並探討兩地合作的機會。
在首爾期間，鄭若驊將拜訪韓國法務部，並與當地的法律專家及執業者會面。她亦會在國際律師協會年會期間，在由香港律師會和香港大律師公會合辦的早餐會上發表演說，以及拜訪中國駐大韓民國大使館。
鄭若驊將於九月二十六日返港。

She will also speak at a breakfast session hosted by the Law Society of Hong Kong and the Hong Kong Bar Association during the Annual Conference of the International Bar Association, and call on the Embassy of the People's Republic of China in Korea.
Ms Cheng will return to Hong Kong on September 26.
